entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
